alert.note: Alert for Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 15 at 8:44PM EST until November 16 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 1 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Southern Penobscot County. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 1 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
